## sdf_is_streaming

## Description
Is the given Spark DataFrame a streaming data?


## Usage
```r
sdf_is_streaming(x)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | A `spark_connection`, `ml_pipeline`, or a `tbl_spark`. |
